common.no_clans_found: No clans were found in our Database for the argument you specified.
common.no_clans_linked: No clans are linked to this server. Why not link some?
common.clan_limit: The maximum number of clans has reached.  Please consider supporting us on our [Patreon](https://patreon.com/clashperk) to add more than two clans.
common.clan_verification:
We need to ensure that you are a leader or co-leader of this clan. Please verify your player account with the API token.
Use the `/verify` command to verify your player account. The API token is available in the Game settings.

Alternatively, you can add a temporary code `{{code}}` in your clan description. Then wait 1-2 min and execute this command again. Once it is verified, you can safely remove the code.
common.no_option: Something went wrong while executing this command. (option not found)
common.no_data: No data is available at this moment. We are still collecting!
common.no_clan_data: No data is available for {{clan}}. We are still collecting!

component.expired: This component has expired, run the command again.
component.unauthorized: You must execute the command to interact with components.

common.no_clan_tag: You must provide a clan tag to execute this command!
common.no_player_tag: You must provide a player tag to execute this command!
common.guild_unauthorized: This server is not authorized for {{clan}}. Use `/setup` command to link the clan.

status_code.400: Client provided incorrect parameters for the request.
status_code.403: API token does not grant access to the requested resource.
status_code.404: No matches were found for the specified tag.
status_code.429: Request was throttled, because amount of requests was above the threshold defined for the used API token.
status_code.500: Unknown error happened when handling the request.
status_code.503: Service is temporarily unavailable because of maintenance.

activity.description: Shows a graph of hourly-active clan members.

clan_games.description: Clan games scoreboard of clan members.

lastseen.description: Last seen time and activities of clan members.

alias.description: Create, delete or view clan aliases.

create.no_name: You must specify an alias name to execute this command.
create.no_hash: A clan alias must not start with a hash.
create.no_whitespace: A clan alias must not contain whitespace.
create.no_clan: You must specify a clan tag to execute this command.
create.exists: An alias with the name {{name}} already exists.
create.clan_not_linked: The clan must be linked to the server to create an alias.
create.success: Successfully created an alias with the name {{name}}.

delete.no_name: You must provide a clan tag or clan alias to execute this command.
delete.no_result: No matches found with the tag or alias {{name}}.

config.no_text_channel: You must specify a text-channel to enable this events log.

cwl.still_searching: Your clan {{clan}} is still searching for the opponent.
cwl.not_in_season: Your clan {{clan}} is not in the CWL season.
cwl.no_rounds: No CWL rounds have been played yet, try again after some time.
cwl.no_season_data: No CWL stats are available for the season {{season}}.

roster.description: CWL roster and town hall distribution.

round.description: CWL summary for the current round.

flag.description: Create, delete or search player flags.

link.description: Create, delete or list player links.
link.no_tag: You must specify a player/clan tag to execute this command.

create.description: Creates a player/clan link with a user account.
create.no_bots: Bot accounts are not allowed to be linked.
create.fail: The player/clan tag you specified is not valid.
create.prompt: What would you like to link? A Player or a Clan?
create.already_linked: {{player}} is already linked to another user. If you own this account, please use the `/verify` command.
create.max_limit: The maximum account limit has been reached. (25 accounts/user)

delete.no_result: No matches found with the tag {{tag}}.
delete.success: Successfully deleted the link with the tag {{tag}}.
delete.no_access: This player should be in your clan and you must be a __Verified__ Co/Leader to perform this action.

verify.description: Verify and link a player using API token.
verify.invalid_token:
You must provide a valid API Token that can be found in the game settings. 
https://i.imgur.com/8dsoUB8.jpg

timezone.set: Please set your timezone with the `/timezone` command. It enables you to view the graphs in your timezone.
timezone.no_result: Make your search more specific and try again.

profile.description: Shows user info and linked accounts.

nickname.description: Choose a nickname from the linked player list.

reminder.description: Create, delete or list war reminders.

create.description: Create a war reminder to mention members.
create.invalid_duration_format: The duration must be in a valid format. e.g 2h, 2.5h, 30m
create.no_message: You must specify a message to execute this command.
create.duration_limit: The duration must be greater than 15 minutes and less than 45 hours.
create.duration_order: Duration must be a multiple of 15 minutes. e.g 15m, 30m, 45m, 1h, 1.25h, 1.5h, 1.75h
create.too_many_clans:
Clan selection menu is not available for more than 25 clans. {{clans}} clans were selected automatically!
To create a reminder for specific clans, pass clan tags or aliases through 'clans' option while executing the command.

delete.description: Delete a single reminder or clear all.
delete.not_found: No reminder found with the ID {{id}}.
delete.success: Successfully deleted the reminder with the ID {{id}}.
delete.too_many_reminders: You have too many reminders, pass reminder id to delete reminders.

attacks.description: Attack and defense scoreboard of clan members.

boosts.description: Clan members with active super troops.

compo.description: Shows Town Hall composition of a clan.

donations.description: Donations and received donations of clan members.

members.description: Get clan member list with heroes, trophies, war preference and much more.

remaining.description: Remaining or missed attacks of a clan.

rushed.description: Rushed units of a player or clan members.

stats.description: Shows attack and defense stats of clan members.

attacks.description: Shows attack success rates of clan members.

defense.description: Shows defense failure rates of clan members.

units.description: Shows units of a player with max/min levels.

upgrades.description: Remaining upgrades of a player with upgrading cost.

setup.description: Enable/disable features on the server or add/remove clans.

enable.description: Enable a feature on the server or add a clan.
enable.missing_access: I'm missing {{permission}} in {{channel}} to execute this command.
enable.no_leader_link: Clan Leader must be linked to the bot to enable this feature.

channel_link.description: Link a channel to a clan.

disable.description: Disable a feature on the server or remove a clan.
disable.channel_not_found: I could not find any clan that is linked to {{channel}}.
disable.autorole_disabled: Auto-role has been disabled for {{count}} clans.
disable.clan_not_linked: No clans were found on the server for the tag your specified.

list.description: List all enabled features and clans.

autorole.description: Enable/disable auto-role feature that assigns roles to members based on their clan role.

enable.description: Enable auto-role feature that assigns roles to members based on their clan role.
enable.no_roles: You must specify 3 roles to execute this command.
enable.no_system_roles: System managed or bot roles are not allowed.
enable.no_higher_roles: My highest role must be higher than these roles.
enable.roles_already_used:
Some roles have already been used for another clan. 
Please consider supporting us on [Patreon](https://patreon.com/clashperk) to use same roles for multiple clans.
enable.clan_not_linked: The clan must be linked to the server to enable auto-role.
enable.success_clan: Successfully enabled auto-role for the clan {{clan}}.

disable.description: Disable auto-role feature that assigns roles to members based upon their clan role.

summary.description: Shows summary of wars, clans, players, clan games, etc.

help.description: Get a list of commands or info about a specific command.

invite.description: Get the bot invite and support server link.

redeem.description: Redeem or manage a Patreon subscription. (if you wish to support us)
